title: I really need help with this
body: Ok last night i went into q for a game like i have many times in the past week, but as soon as champ select counts down, i get sent straight to the 'the game has crashed please reconnect' page. If i try to reconnect it either goes black screen then back to the recconect page after a few seconds and sometimes it will have a box saying the client stopped working 'search for problem online' which does nothing and sends me back to the rc page or 'close program.' so after last night i completely deleted league and reinstalled. I thought it would be working so got into another game but i have the exact same problem. I dont know what to do to get it working. The shop and homescreen and chat all work normally, champ select too, its just when champ sellect finishes and it tries to launch into the pregame load screen (which never comes up cause it goes straight to rc page)  Should i do a system restore to a previous point for my cpu or delete a file thats corrupt or something?? If you can help me to get it working again i would be very grateful.

replies.body:
Hey,

Sorry to hear you're seeing this issue.

As with many crashing/connection issues, I'd suggest going through the support articles on [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as well as [Bug Splats and Game Crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes).

One other question - do you run any third party programs alongside LoL?

Mindstar
thanks :) what exactly could those third party programs be? Im not sure but i dont believe i have any, and haven't downloaded anything recently
Mostly things like firewall / antivirus programs that might interfere with LoL.  Then there is stuff that a few people use to record games - overlay software (eg. from TeamSpeak), LOLReplay etc.
